msg: Improve the error message when SSLEngine is disabled in AprLifecycleListener and SSL is configured for an APR/native connector.

author: markt
msg: Fix issue with Manager app and other apps that use i18n in the UI when a request that specifies an Accept-Language of English ahead of French, Spanish or Japanese.
Port all the other improvements to the StringManager from trunk as well
